mapper.select: SELECT STEP_TWO.* FROM( SELECT STEP_ONE.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, XA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBROADCAST) AS TOTAL_COUNT, IDX, CATEGORY, GENRE, TITLE, GRADE, FOLDERNAME, ALBUMNAME, FILENAME, EXPLANATION, FILE_URL, SUB_URL, COUNTRY, PLAY_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r') AS INSERT_DATE, HIT, PRIORITY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PLAY_DATE DESC ) XA, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 AND XA.CATEGORY LIKE #{param2} AND XA.GENRE LIKE #{param3} AND XA.FOLDERNAME LIKE #{param4} AND (XA.TITLE LIKE #{param5} OR XA.FILENAME LIKE #{param5}) AND XA.COUNTRY LIKE #{param6} ORDER BY XA.PLAY_DATE DESC, XA.INSERT_DATE DESC, XA.TITLE DESC ) STEP_ONE WHERE STEP_ONE.RNUM <= #{param1} + 15 ) STEP_TWO WHERE STEP_TWO.RNUM >= #{param1} ORDER BY RNUM
SELECT CATEGORY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY CATEGORY
SELECT CATEGORY, GENRE FROM TBROADCAST WHERE 1=1 AND CATEGORY LIKE #{param1} GROUP BY CATEGORY, GENRE

SELECT IDX, CATEGORY, GENRE, TITLE, GRADE, FOLDERNAME, ALBUMNAME, FILENAME, EXPLANATION, FILE_URL, SUB_URL, COUNTRY, PLAY_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r'), HIT, PRIORITY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE idx = #{idx}

SELECT IDX, CATEGORY, GENRE, TITLE, GRADE, FOLDERNAME, ALBUMNAME, FILENAME, EXPLANATION, FILE_URL, SUB_URL, COUNTRY, PLAY_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r'), HIT, PRIORITY FROM TBROADCAST WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBROADCAST SET category = #{category}, genre = #{genre}, title = #{title}, grade = #{grade}, foldername = #{foldername}, albumname = #{albumname}, filename = #{filename}, explanation = #{explanation}, file_url = #{file_url}, sub_url = #{sub_url}, country = #{country}, play_date = #{play_date}, priority = #{priority}, insert_date = #{insert_date} WHERE idx = #{idx} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBROADCAST_COMMENT WHERE idx = #{idx} ORDER BY seq_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBROADCAST_COMMENT (idx, comment, author, insert_id, idx_no, seq_re, seq_no, gap) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{comment}, #{author}, #{insert_id}, #{idx_no}, #{seq_re}, #{seq_no}, #{gap} )
mapper.select: SELECT STEP_TWO.* FROM( SELECT STEP_ONE.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, XAA.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM1:=@ROWNUM1+1 AS RNUM1, XA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBOARD WHERE GUBUN = #{param2}) AS TOTAL_COUNT, IDX, IF(GUBUN = 'level', '등업', '자료요청') AS GUBUN, CATEGORY, TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTENT, HIT, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %r') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_ID, MODIFY_DATE, (SELECT CUST_GB FROM TCUSTOMER WHERE CUST_ID = INSERT_ID) AS CUST_GB FROM TBOARD WHERE 1=1 AND GUBUN = #{param2} ORDER BY INSERT_DATE ) XA, (SELECT @ROWNUM1:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ) XAA, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY RNUM1 DESC ) STEP_ONE WHERE STEP_ONE.RNUM <= #{param1} + 15 ) STEP_TWO WHERE STEP_TWO.RNUM >= #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE TCUSTOMER SET cust_gb = '20' WHERE cust_id = (SELECT insert_id FROM TBOARD WHERE idx = #{idx})
UPDATE TBOARD SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = SYSDATE() WHERE idx = #{idx} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBOARD_COMMENT WHERE idx = #{idx} ORDER BY seq_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBOARD_COMMENT (idx, comment, author, insert_id, idx_no, seq_re, seq_no, gap) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{comment}, #{author}, #{insert_id}, #{idx_no}, #{seq_re}, #{seq_no}, #{gap} )
mapper.select: SELECT STEP_TWO.* FROM( SELECT STEP_ONE.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM, XAA.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM1:=@ROWNUM1+1 AS RNUM1, XA.* FROM( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT CUST_NO, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') FROM TLOGINHISTORY GROUP BY CUST_NO, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d')) CNT) AS TOTAL_COUNT, A.CUST_ID, B.CUST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(A.INSERT_DATE), '%Y/%m/%d %T') AS INSERT_DATE FROM TLOGINHISTORY A, TCUSTOMER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.CUST_NO = B.CUST_NO GROUP BY A.CUST_NO, B.CUST_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(A.INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') ) XA, (SELECT @ROWNUM1:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ) XAA, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) TMP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY INSERT_DATE DESC ) STEP_ONE WHERE STEP_ONE.RNUM <= #{param1} + 9 ) STEP_TWO WHERE STEP_TWO.RNUM >= #{param1}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS LOGIN_DATE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TLOGINHISTORY WHERE 1=1 AND INSERT_DATE > date_add(now(), interval - 11 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d')
